title: PhpWebStudy software version switch
text1: 1. Take PHP as an example, click the version management button, it will show all available versions, select the version you want to install/uninstall to install/uninstall
text2: 2. Click the switch version button, select the current version you want to use to switch
text3: 3. Click the Service button, the currently selected version and the path to the executable file will be displayed, click the Start/Shutdown button to start/shutdown the service
